WorkItem.Description:
Whenever I try to import my character from b.net be it with the online version or a downloaded copy, I receive the following error.
 
== Version: 4.2.3.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
There is an error in XML document (13, 6).
[Xml_MixedReadElementContentAs]
Arguments: ,13,6
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60531.0&File=System.Xml.dll&Key=Xml_MixedReadElementContentAs
 
== StackTrace ==
   at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(XmlReader xmlReader, String encodingStyle, Object events)
   at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(TextReader textReader)
   at Rawr.Character.LoadFromXml(String xml)

Comments.Message: Please provide the character information that you were trying to import from Battle.Net (i.e. Name - Server)

US-Uther Silueen

However I get the same errors when I try to import any of my alts, even ones on other realms.
I can't find anything wrong. I would suggest checking if you have the latest version of .Net Framework installed or maybe reinstalling it.
